title: iShares Core S&P 500
text:
iShares Core S&P 500 July 15, 2015 Symbol: IVV Expense Ratio: 0.07% 
Standard & Poorâ€™s 500-stock index is synonymous with the U.S. market and is the benchmark against which most large-cap managers are judged. Unlike SPDR S&P 500 ETF, iShares Core S&P 500 lets shareholders reinvest dividends.
